travaux.title: SOGRALE Presentation
travaux.description:
SOGRALE (Company for the Management and Implementation of Transport Lines) is an Algerian company specialized in the management, operation and development of urban and interurban transport networks.

Thanks to a qualified team and modern solutions, the company works to facilitate mobility, optimize routes and ensure an accessible transport experience for everyone.

hero.title: Search your route
hero.description: Enter your starting point and destination to find the best route:

about.title: About Sogral
about.description: Discover our transport services and offers to make your trips in Algeria easier.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Sign up to receive the latest news and offers from Sogral.

asd.title: Share, participate, report — your voice matters
asd.description: At SOGRAL, we continuously improve service quality thanks to your feedback. Share your opinion, take part in quick surveys, or submit a complaint — every contribution helps us make your journeys safer and smoother.
